item.title: RFK Jr. singled out one study to cut funds for global vaccines. Is that study valid?
item.description: When RFK Jr. announced he would cut funds from Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance, he cited "vaccine safety," referring to a 2017 study from Guinea-Bissau. We...

item.title: The White House took down the nation's top climate report. You can still find it here
item.description: The National Climate Assessment is the most influential source of information about climate change in the United States.

item.title: Waffle House drops egg surcharge as prices fall back to Earth
item.description: Waffle House has dropped its 50 cent surcharge on eggs as supplies rebound. The chain added the temporary charge in February, when avian flu sent egg ...

item.title: Televangelist Jimmy Swaggart dies at age 90
item.description: Jimmy Swaggart, one of the most well-known televangelists of the 1980s, has died, according to a social media post from his ministry.

item.title: The Trump admin is withholding over $6 billion in education grants for schools
